text:
="preserve">The Magnavox Odyssey is a video game console by Magnavox. It is the first one to be released commercially. But there are more consoles released by Magnavox. All these consoles form the Magnavox Odyssey series.
Successor.
In 1974, Magnavox became a subsidiary of Philips. Philips continued making video game consoles. These consoles are known as the Philips Odyssey series.
